sub_topic: Calculating the surface area of a cube.
message_1: A cube has a side length of 4 cm. Calculate the surface area of the cube.
message_2:
To calculate the surface area of a cube, we use the formula:

Surface area = 6 × (side length)^2

In this case, the side length is 4 cm. So, we plug in the values:

Surface area = 6 × (4 cm)^2
Surface area = 6 × 16 cm^2
Surface area = 96 cm^2

The surface area of the cube is 96 square centimeters.
